dialogue.text: Pst... If you have the right goods, I can turn it into something niice...

listSelection.title: What would you like me to do?
So, what kind of glove would you like me to make?
An upgraded glove? Sure thing, but note that upgrades won't carry over to the new item...
So, what kind of claw would you like me to make?
An upgraded claw? Sure thing, but note that upgrades won't carry over to the new item...
Materials? I know of a few materials that I can make for you...

choices.text: Make Processed Wood with Tree Branch
